title: Smurfs are killing this server.
body:
Just queued as a 2man and got the same smurf 5 man against us 2 games in a row. 

Then I type "lol oce" into DuckduckGo and the first thing to show up is fucking accounts for sale on EBay and account boosting services as well. 

I remember a time when you could queue up and have an enjoyable game against people of your own skill level instead of every second game being over at 15mins
